actor_awards.notes: A quintessential 1950s teen idol and chart-topping singer ('Young Love'). Later in his career, he gained cult status for his work with director John Waters and his openness about his sexuality in the documentary 'Tab Hunter Confidential'.

filmography.title: Damn Yankees
filmography.role_description: A middle-aged baseball fan is transformed into a young athletic superstar to help his favorite team beat the Yankees.
filmography.plot: A fan sells his soul to the devil to become a slugger for the Washington Senators and help them win the pennant against the New York Yankees.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy (Film)

filmography.title: Battle Cry
filmography.role_description: A wholesome young Marine who tries to stay faithful to his high school sweetheart despite the temptations of war.
filmography.plot: A group of Marines from different backgrounds undergo training and fight in the Pacific theater during World War II.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture (Film)

filmography.title: Polyester
filmography.role_description: A handsome drive-in theater owner who romances the troubled Francine Fishpaw in this John Waters cult classic.
filmography.plot: A suburban housewife's life falls apart as her husband leaves her, her children rebel, and she falls for a dashing stranger.

filmography.title: Gunman's Walk
filmography.role_description: The wild and violent son of a rancher whose behavior leads to tragedy.
filmography.plot: A rancher tries to raise his two sons, but one becomes a killer, forcing the father to make a difficult choice.

filmography.title: Track of the Cat
filmography.role_description: The youngest and most sensitive brother in a dysfunctional ranching family terrorized by a panther.
filmography.plot: A pioneer family is snowed in at their ranch while a panther stalks their livestock and the brothers try to hunt it down.

filmography.title: The Burning Hills
filmography.role_description: A man on the run from a cattle baron's gang who hides out with a Mexican woman (Natalie Wood).
filmography.plot: A young man pursued by a gang hides in the hills with a beautiful woman who helps him survive.

filmography.title: That Kind of Woman
filmography.role_description: A young paratrooper who falls in love with a woman kept by a wealthy man on a train.
filmography.plot: A woman who is the mistress of a powerful man falls in love with a younger soldier she meets on a train.

filmography.title: Lust in the Dust
filmography.role_description: A mysterious gunman who arrives in a town of Chili Verde in this western parody.
filmography.plot: A group of misfits descend on a small western town in search of buried gold, leading to campy chaos.

filmography.title: The Sea Chase
filmography.role_description: A young German cadet aboard a freighter trying to outrun the British navy at the start of WWII.
filmography.plot: A German freighter captain tries to get his ship back to Germany at the outbreak of World War II while being pursued by the British.

filmography.title: Grease 2
filmography.role_description: The substitute biology teacher at Rydell High who catches the eye of the students.
filmography.plot: A new English exchange student tries to win the heart of the leader of the Pink Ladies by becoming a cool biker.

filmography.title: Ride the Wild Surf
filmography.role_description: A surfer who travels to Hawaii to conquer the big waves.
filmography.plot: Three friends travel to Oahu's North Shore to surf the big waves and find romance.

filmography.title: They Came to Cordura
filmography.role_description: A soldier selected for a Medal of Honor journey who reveals his own cowardice.
filmography.plot: An army major is tasked with escorting five candidates for the Medal of Honor to a rear base during the 1916 Mexican Expedition.

filmography.title: The Girl He Left Behind
filmography.role_description: A spoiled college student who gets drafted into the army and learns responsibility.
filmography.plot: A young man flunks out of college and is drafted, making life difficult for his superiors and his girlfriend.

filmography.title: The Pleasure of His Company
filmography.role_description: The rancher fiancé of Debbie Reynolds' character, whose wedding is disrupted by her father.
filmography.plot: A playboy father returns home for his daughter's wedding and tries to charm her and his ex-wife, disrupting the proceedings.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actor (Fred Astaire)

filmography.title: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as a strange outlaw in this revisionist western.
filmography.plot: An outlaw establishes his own brand of law and order in a small town on the Pecos River.

filmography.title: Island of Desire
filmography.role_description: A young Marine stranded on an island with a mature nurse (Linda Darnell). Also known as 'Saturday Island'.
filmography.plot: A nurse and a young marine are shipwrecked on a tropical island during WWII.

filmography.title: The Lawless
filmography.role_description: A minor early role in this noir drama about racial tensions.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor faces mob violence when he tries to protect a Mexican fruit picker falsely accused of a crime.

filmography.title: The Loved One
filmography.role_description: A guide at the bizarre cemetery in this dark satire.
filmography.plot: A young British poet visits his uncle in Los Angeles and gets involved in the funeral business.

filmography.title: Lafayette Escadrille
filmography.role_description: An American flyer in the French Air Service during WWI.
filmography.plot: The story of the American volunteers who flew for France before the US entered World War I.

filmography.title: Operation Bikini
filmography.role_description: A Lieutenant leading an underwater demolition team mission.
filmography.plot: A demolition team is sent to a Japanese-held island to destroy a sunken American submarine before the enemy can salvage its radar.

filmography.title: Sweet Kill
filmography.role_description: A disturbed gym teacher who turns to murder. Also known as 'The Arousers'.
filmography.plot: A PE teacher is unable to perform sexually, so he murders women to get satisfaction.

filmography.title: Cameron's Closet
filmography.role_description: The father whose psychic experiments on his son unleash a demon.
filmography.plot: A father experiments with his son's psychokinetic powers, but the experiments go wrong and summon a demon.

filmography.title: The Golden Arrow
filmography.role_description: A bandit leader who must prove himself worthy to marry a princess in this Italian adventure film.
filmography.plot: A bandit discovers he is of royal blood and must complete three tasks to claim his birthright and the hand of a princess.

filmography.title: San Francisco International
filmography.role_description: A pilot involved in a heist plot in this TV movie that served as a pilot for a series.
filmography.plot: A grand scale heist is planned at the San Francisco International Airport.

filmography.title: Grotesque
filmography.role_description: A family man whose vacation is interrupted by punks and a monster.
filmography.plot: A gang of punks attacks a family in a remote cabin, only to find themselves hunted by a creature living in the area.

filmography.title: Dark Horse
filmography.role_description: One of Hunter's final film roles.
filmography.plot: A girl must perform community service at a ranch, where she bonds with a horse.
